name: Take your kid to space day
name_original: Take your kid to space day
description:
You use the A and D keys to move, and the Space bar to shoot. 

You have 3 health and a kid who could die in one hit. Make sure you both don't die.

The goal of the game is to survive waves if alien invaders for 60 seconds. If you get your health to 0 or if an alien touches your kid. It's game over.

There are power ups. The red one regenerates all of your health. The blue one freezes your kid in place for a few seconds. 

If you die, refresh the page.
